name: Blue Ceramic Vase
description: Handcrafted traditional blue pottery vase with intricate floral designs. Made using natural clay and non-toxic colors.

name: Ceramic Tea Set
description: Beautiful hand-painted tea set with 4 cups and teapot. Made with food-safe glazes and traditional designs.

name: Embroidered Wall Hanging
description: Vibrant mirror work wall hanging with traditional Kutch patterns. Each piece takes over 20 days to complete.

name: Embroidered Cushion Covers (Set of 2)
description: Hand-embroidered cushion covers with traditional mirror work. Made with sustainable cotton and natural dyes.

name: Carved Wooden Box
description: Intricately carved storage box made from sustainable sheesham wood. Features traditional geometric patterns.

name: Wooden Wall Panels (Set of 3)
description: Hand-carved decorative wall panels showing scenes from Indian mythology. Each panel is carved from a single piece of wood.

name: Traditional Blue Pottery Vase
description: Handcrafted blue pottery vase with intricate floral patterns. Made using traditional techniques passed down through generations. Food-safe and lead-free glazes.

name: Blue Clay Bowl
description: Small Bowl made of Clay with blue colour

name: White Ceramic Pot
description: This exquisite handcrafted white ceramic pot showcases the artistry of handcraft masters, featuring round pot made of white clay using Traditional materials. Each piece reflects skilled craftsmanship and celebrates India's rich cultural heritage, bringing authentic traditional artistry to your collection.

name: Embroidered Table Runner
description: This exquisite handcrafted embroidered table runner showcases the artistry of handcraft masters, featuring table runner with mirror work using Traditional materials. Each piece reflects skilled craftsmanship and celebrates India's rich cultural heritage, bringing authentic traditional artistry to your collection.

name: Red Clay Water Pot
description: Hold in your hands a legacy, forged in the sun-drenched clay of India.  For generations, the skilled hands of an artisan family, steeped in ancient traditions passed down through countless summers, have shaped this Red Clay Water Pot.  Feel the warmth of their touch, the quiet devotion poured into each curve and subtle imperfection—a whisper of hopes and dreams, woven into the very fabric of the earth itself. This isn't merely a vessel for water; it's a sacred offering, imbued with the vibrant spirit of Indian culture, a connection to centuries of festivals, rituals, and the simple, profound act of sharing life's daily blessings.  Bring home a piece of India's soul, and let its earthy grace enrich your life with beauty, comfort, and the enduring spirit of handcrafted heritage.

name: Sandalwood Jewelry Box
description: These weathered hands, shaped by years of patient carving and filled with *समर्पण* (dedication), have whispered secrets into this sandalwood box.  Techniques passed down through generations, each delicate curve a testament to a mother's love and a daughter's skill, imbue the wood with the quiet peace of a Mysore dawn.  Holding it, you cradle not just a treasure, but a piece of India's soul, carrying the artisan's *आशीर्वाद* (blessings) and a precious thread of *विरासत* (heritage).

name: Handwoven Silk Scarf
description: These hands, weathered and gentle,  have woven this silk scarf with unwavering *समर्पण* (dedication), each thread a whisper of prayer.  The techniques, passed down through generations, are a song sung softly from mother to daughter, a legacy of artistry echoing through time. This piece, imbued with the vibrant colours of a Rajasthan sunset, carries the artisan's *आशीर्वाद* (blessings), a piece of India's heart to warm your soul and preserve a precious विरासत (heritage).
